Uses of Class
cards.Deck

  • Packages that use Deck 
    Package Description
    cards
    Contains the classes that deal with cards and decks in Cards Against Humanity.
    game
    Contains classes that have to do with the actual game of Cards Against Humanity itself.
    users
    The package that contains the classes that have to do with users, user information, and keeping records on users so that they can be impersonated by the computer.

    • Uses of Deck in cards

      Fields in cards declared as Deck 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Deck DeckBuilder.deck
      The deck that the DeckBuilder is building
      Methods in cards that return Deck 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Deck Hand.deal_draw(Deck a)
      Deals cards at the begining of a game and draws cards at the end of each turn.
      Deck Hand.exceedLimitDraw(Deck a, int numberOfCardsOverLimit)
      Draws more cards than the limit in the middle of a turn.
      Deck DeckBuilder.getDeck()
      Gets the original card deck as it is at the start of the game.
